extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void captionChanged​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Allows user to recaption the photo
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Intializes the screen by turning off editing of photo and just displaying contents
    void nextPhotoPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Allows user to display next photo, creating a slideshow
    void photoChoiceClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Allows user to delete photo, move photo to a different album, or copy to a different album Displays all albums so user has a choice to pick Makes sure you are not copying/moving to same album or an album that does not exist
    void prevPhotoPressed​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Allows user to display the photo right before, creating a slideshow
    void setAlbumAndUserandPhoto​(UserDetail user, AlbumDetail album, PhotoDetail photo)
    Displays the content of the photo and allows user to pass current user, album, and photo into this method
    void setFromSearch()
    Keeps track of whether photo displayed is one from an album or from search results
    void turnOffEditing()
    Turns off editing mode by locking ability to recaption, delete, add/delete tags, move/copy photo
    void turnOnEditing()
    Turns on editing ability by unlocking add/delete tag, delete photo, recaption, move/copy photo
    void typeSelected​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    Allows user to choose a tag type and checks whether the type already exists

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
